channel.title: ZooMania on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in ZooMania on ZooBerry

item.title: Elephant Bird Variants
item.description: A bundle of beautiful elephant bird variants made by ShenTirag!

item.title: Ibex Reskin
item.description: An ibex reskin made by Koala Komander! Modifies both male and female ibex textures.

item.title: Wahoo Ambient
item.description: The Wahoo is a game fish, found in the open see, and is related to the Marlin and Mackerel.

item.description: Two markhor variants made by Animalover44.

item.description: A spotted variant for the Giant Warthog made by Koala Komander! Modifies both male and female textures.

item.title: Compatibility Hack Plus EA
item.description: This makes all official ZT2 animals, sans exception, be comfortable in any biome and with any space.

item.title: Compatibility Hack
item.description: This hack makes all the ZT2, ES, AA and MM animals, plus the black panther, the asian elephant, the musk ox and the addax 100% comfortable in any biome and with any space.

item.title: Guest Limit Hack
item.description: Increases the guest limit.

item.title: Perentie
item.description: Perenties are fairly large lizards in the monitor family.

item.title: Nile Monitor
item.description: The Nile Monitor is a large, fast, and agile lizard from the rainforest outskirts and grasslands of Africa.

item.title: African Civet and Giant Eland
item.description: A Civet from the tropics of Africa, Biome is Tropical Rainforest and Savannah. Giant Eland is one of the largest antelope in the world, lives in the Savannahs of East Africa.

item.title: Water Springs Fountain
item.description: A beautiful fountain.

item.title: Jungle Croc Trashcan
item.description: A jungle-themed trashcan with a croc head on it.

item.title: Zoomania Path
item.description: This path was designed for the ZooMania 100 Member Celebration Party.

item.title: Waterfall Fountain
item.description: A soothing waterfall perfect for wetlands or tropical rainforest areas in your zoos.

item.title: South American Trashcan
item.description: We made this trashcan a while ago. We hope that you all enjoy it.

item.title: Mini Trashcan Pack
item.description: In this pack, you will find a Royal Trascan, Marble Trashcan, and a Wooden Trashcan.

item.title: Mahogany Bench
item.description: A dark wooden bench great for any rest stop or viewing area.

item.title: Large Safari Fountain
item.description: This is a large version of the savannah themed fountain

item.title: Yellow Mongoose
item.description: An African mongoose. Its main biome is scrub. Will not dig under chain link fences!

item.title: Waterbuck
item.description: Here’s a waterbuck for your zoo.

item.title: Wallaroo
item.description: It is one star, main biome is scrub, but it also likes alpine.

item.title: Spanish Broom Hare
item.description: A plant and animal both from northern Spain.

item.title: Narrow-Striped Mongoose
item.description: A bushy-tailed mongoose from the dry forests of Madagascar.

item.title: Pygmy Goat
item.description: The Pygmy Goat is a grassland animal that all of the guests love.

item.title: Nutria
item.description: A large rodent!

item.description: The American flamingo lives in the Coastal Biome.

item.description: The Atlantic Sailfish is uber amazing: It’s also AWESOME and POINTY! (quote from ShenTirag)

item.description: Enjoy this trio of shelters made by ShenTirag!

item.description: A large, colourful Pelican found in South and Central America. Has 2 varients, biome is Reef.

item.description: A donation box with a cactus in it.

item.description: New and improved, with 4 different skins and a new model for both adult and baby!

item.title: Fantasy Wolf
item.description: Here’s a colorful wolf that eats almost anything.

item.title: Fringe Eared Oryx
item.description: The Fringe-Eared Oryx is a scrub dwelling antelope. It is a subspecies of gemsbok native to southern Africa.

item.title: Giant Eland
item.description: The Largest Species of Antelope - Now Available to Adopt in Your Zoo! Comes with 3 Variant Skins!

item.title: Gingerbread Fence
item.description: Use the gingerbread wall to spice up your holiday zoos and to create fun areas in your zoos.

item.description: The Goral is an Asian Antelope

item.description: This is the Greater Kudu, the second largest antelope in Africa.

item.description: My ultimate uber hedge maze

item.description: A large goat from the Himalayas.

item.description: An Indian rhino for your zoo. Recolored from the Javan rhino.

item.title: Indian Rhinoceros II
item.description: A large, endangered species of rhino from Northern India.

item.title: Iriomote Cat
item.description: The Iriomote cat, an endangered species from Japan.

item.title: Italian Wolf
item.description: A subspecies of wolf from the Apennine Mountains in Italy.

item.title: Kiang
item.description: This Asian equid lives in the desert biome, and is a light sandy colour.

item.title: Large Kelp Forest
item.description: This is a large version of the kelp forest available in MM2.

item.title: Long-Tailed Weasel
item.description: This is a North American weasel for ZT2. It contains 2 variants (not shown) - white and brown with light facial markings.

item.title: Miniature Pony
item.description: A miniature pony! for your zoo! =D

item.title: Platyhystrix
item.description: Platyhystrix, a little-known sailbacked amphibian from the permian, is now adoptable for your zoos!
